CustomField.description: This Recurring Donation's total amount for the current calendar or fiscal year (read only). Includes Closed Won Opportunities plus future installments for the rest of the year.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This Recurring Donation's total amount for the current calendar or fiscal year (read only). Includes Closed Won Opportunities plus future installments for the rest of the year.
CustomField.label: Current Year Value
